pages.title: Redstone Fluid Valve
pages.text: Similar to $(o)Fluid Pipe Check Valves$(), $(o)Redstone Fluid Valves$() allow liquids to pass through only in the forward direction. An additional redstone-mechanical mechanism also inhibits forward flows by locking the prestressed spring plate, unless a Redstone signal is applied.
This valve type is useful if you need to enable or disable fluid replenishments of devices, or e.g. if you like to switch between process fluids in an automated system.
